data.message: LIKE: bigger pictures. DON'T LIKE: you've made key icons black on dark blue. Contrast is extremely poor. This is not good design, especially for older eyes. BTW, more older eyes on FB every day and these older users have $$ so start paying attention to their needs! {steps off soapbox}

replies.message: Thanks for all of your feedback, Erin. We'll share your thoughts with our team as we strive to provide the best possible experience for everyone. If you have any additional thoughts about what you would change, please submit them here: http://on.fb.me/1evgqsh -Leigh

Facebook Leigh, do you guys test these changes with a nice range of ages before implementing? Because 22 year old programmers rarely understand best UX for elders. I'm honestly curious about your testing.
